SELECT , b.depart_name FROM pd_goods_allocation a left join sys_depart b on a.depart_id = b.id
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.area_type = '1'
AND ( a.name LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.py LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.wb LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') or a.zdy LIKE concat('%',#{name},'%') )
AND a.depart_id LIKE concat('%',#{departId},'%')
AND a.parent_id LIKE concat('%',#{parentId},'%')
ORDER BY a.name
